name: Small Bird
description:
Small Bird, was originally created in around 4 hours, as a learning project.  The creator of this project is Michael Somerville.

How to play?

Get away from that other bird, and beat your high score, there is no longer a simple and easy way to win. Small Bird has a finish line at the end of the map. Coin's will give you a chance to buy speed, know that the speed will have a reset in exactly 11 seconds each purchase.

1120 x 600 screen size.
